entry.title: My 2013 in code
entry.content:
This year has been good to me, in code and in personal life. Got to improve some personal projects, did some interesting things at work, and received pretty good news.

I finally got to give back, releasing some opensource projects like localio, clusterer or smart-location-lib.

I also had the most interesting vacation trip ever, got to think about what I want to do with my life and have a nice time.

On the dark side, I also experimented what we usually call burnout in summer. The solution was easy, as seen in the contribution “punch card”, I used my vacation time to do other stuff and finally got my shit together. And that’s behind me now – now I’m even on a coding streak!

I’m really looking forward to what 2014 has in store for me.
